<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Handle all toggle headings
  const toggleHeadings = document.querySelectorAll('.toggle-heading');
  
  toggleHeadings.forEach(heading => {
    // Find the next sibling that is the toggle-content div
    let content = heading.nextElementSibling;
    while (content && !content.classList.contains('toggle-content')) {
      content = content.nextElementSibling;
    }
    
    if (content) {
      // Start expanded by default
      // To start collapsed, uncomment the next line:
      // content.classList.add('collapsed');
      
      heading.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        content.classList.toggle('collapsed');
      });
    }
  });
});
</script>
